maple: b:= proc(n, i, t) option remember; `if`(n=0, `if`(t=0, 1, 0),
mathematica: b[n_, i_, k_, t_] := b[n, i, k, t] = If[n == 0, If[t == 0, 1, 0], If[i < 1 || t < 1, 0, b[n, i-1, k, t] + If[i^2 > n, 0, b[n-i^2, i, k, t-1]]]]; T[n_, k_] := b[n, Sqrt[n] // Floor, k, k]; Table[Table[T[n, k], {k, 0, n}], {n, 0, 14}] // Flatten (* _Jean-François Alcover_, Jun 06 2014, after _Alois P. Heinz_ *)
T[n_, k_] := Count[PowersRepresentations[n, k, 2], r_ /; FreeQ[r, 0]]; T[0, 0] = 1; Table[T[n, k], {n, 0, 14}, {k, 0, n}] // Flatten (* _Jean-François Alcover_, Feb 19 2016 *)
program: (PARI) T(n,k,L=n)=if(n>k*L^2, 0, k>n-3, k==n, k<2, issquare(n,&n) && n<=L*k, k>n-6, n-k==3, L=min(L,sqrtint(n-k+1)); sum(r=0,min(n\L^2,k-1),T(n-r*L^2,k-r,L-1), n==k*L^2)) \\ _M. F. Hasler_, Aug 03 2020
